AboutUS.aboutUsSlogen: A few reasons for choosing us

aboutUsText.line1: Explorem is a team of experts providing services related to
aboutUsText.line2: human resources, language, and nursing formation, and coaching on recruitment, management, and training
aboutUsText.line4: What makes us different among the others is how we treat and assist our candidates in creating their career opportunities and being qualified in the global market.
aboutUsText.line5: Founded in the year 2021 by its present two managing directors, Mr. Abdessamad Aboul Ossoud and Dr. Gracila V. Ucag. Both have essential experiences working with foreign business partners in assisting qualified professionals to make the leap to their new dream job.

slogen1.line1: “Make a leap to your dream job.
slogen1.line2: Create your career opportunities with us to make your goals come true!”

grid1.title: Vision
grid1.text: The vision of Explorem is to be recognized as an influential and distinguished provider of reliable human resources, management, and recruitment coaching services through excellence in training, scholarly activity, and research, and advancing each candidate's profession.

grid2.title: Mission
grid2.text: To provide reliable and transparent human resources services, and excellent professional training and coaching on recruitment and management.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
WhyChooseUs.line1: We are committed, reliable, and transparent in providing excellent services to each client and candidate we have.
WhyChooseUs.line2: Together, we create opportunities; we guide, support, and motivate candidates to make their career goals come true.
WhyChooseUs.line3: We ensure to make a difference in the services we provide, and we make it happen in our own professional way.
WhyChooseUs.line4: We believe in pushing the boundaries of what's possible. We are a team of experts committed to delivering outstanding results.

whatWeHaveAchieved.title: What we have achieved?
whatWeHaveAchieved.line1: Presented our program to more than 2,000+ student-nurses and graduates all over Morocco.
whatWeHaveAchieved.line2: 800+ students and nurses signed contracts with our program for qualified nurses.
whatWeHaveAchieved.line3: Maintained nursing school partnership from different cities of Morocco (Rabat, Casablanca, Marrakech, Agadir, Tetouan, Oujda).
whatWeHaveAchieved.line4: In 2024, we launch our scholarship program to qualified nurses, offering FREE German course, recruitment and relocation services.
whatWeHaveAchieved.line5: Explorem managing directors, teachers, students and candidates were interviewed and featured in ZDF heute (German TV), in February 2024.
whatWeHaveAchieved.line6: In 2023, there were 20 candidates issued with pre-visa approval; 20 active candidates relocated to Germany; and 23 other candidates were issued their deficit notice of their diploma equivalency.
whatWeHaveAchieved.line7: Explorem nurse candidates relocated in Germany were featured in WDR Lokalzeit aus Köln.
whatWeHaveAchieved.line8: In February 2023, in partnership with German employers, there were 34 newly graduate nurse-candidates who received scholarships in our program. It includes free B1 and B2 language course, with monthly stipend, with examination fees, recognition and professional qualifications fees, visa cost, and other relocation expenses covered.
whatWeHaveAchieved.line9: From February to March 2023, 54 of our active candidates directly signed their work contracts with the German employers.
whatWeHaveAchieved.line10: In 2021 to 2022, more than 100 nurse candidates who were issued with final deficit notice and qualified to take knowledge test; 2 candidates with direct recognition; and more than 80 candidates who were recipients of the program were relocated to Germany.

slogen2.line1: “ We believe in pushing boundaries of what’s possible.
slogen2.line2: We are a team of experts committed to delivering outstanding results.”

Gracila.fullName: GRACILA V. UCAG, RN, MAN, PHD

experiences.2: Master of Arts in Nursing (MAN), with specialization in Adult Health Nursing and Community Health Nursing
experiences.3: Doctor of Philosophy (PhD), Educational Management, with specialization in nursing education
experiences.6: Works in nursing education/formation/training since 2004 , with specialization in medical-surgical nursing, nursing research and evidence-based practice (12 years in the University in Philippines and 5 years in UAE-managed College, Morocco Campus).

experiences.2: Morocco tourism - Professional National Official Tour Guide
experiences.3: Audio-visual and professional photography location manager since 1995
experiences.4: Speaking : Arabic, French, English, Russian, and Spanish

Training/Formation.title: Training/Formation (Language and Nursing)
description: Online and onsite German courses (A1 to B2 level)
Online and onsite Nursing courses in English
With participation certificate when level is completed
Free material given during the class

JobPlacement.title: Job Placement
description: Examination of candidate’s diploma and certificate
Arranging job interviews with provided interpreter support
Preparation for an online or face to face interview
Ensuring a bilingual employment contract is in place

VocationalTrainingPlacement.title: Vocational Training Placement
description: Assistance in finding vocational training in Germany
Professional CV creation highlighting skills and achievements
German language courses to enhance proficiency
Guidance and assistance with visa processes
Ongoing support upon arrival, including accommodation search

DegreeRecognition.title: Degree recognition in collaboration with the employers and our global partners
description: Creation of a candidate-specific further education agreement according to the requirements of the licensing authorities
Recognition management until receipt of the professional certificate

ProfessionalQualification.title: Professional qualification in collaboration with employers and our global partners

On-boardingandIntegration.title: On-boarding and Integration in collaboration with the employers and our global partners
description: Applying for visas and work permits
Registration with the statutory health insurance

Employers.descriptionEmployers: Project Management (related to human resources, recruitment, nursing education, language formation/training)

line1.title: Coordination with Local Partners
line1.description: Collaborate with local schools, institutions, associations, and other partners to establish strong recruitment networks.

line2.title: Project Presentation and Targeting
line2.description: Craft and deliver compelling project presentations targeting the most suitable profiles for your organization's needs.

line3.title: Job Description Establishment
line3.description: Develop detailed job descriptions for each category, outlining roles, responsibilities, and required qualifications.

line4.title: Candidate Profiling
line4.description: Identify and target the most suitable candidate profiles, including those with at least a B1 language certificate or a willingness to learn the required language level.

line5.title: Qualification Assessment and Candidate Selection
line5.description: Conduct thorough assessments of candidate qualifications and skills to select the most suitable candidates for your positions.

line6.title: Language Formation Monitoring
line6.description: Monitor candidates' language formation progress and performance based on the agreed-upon language training program.

line7.title: Document Collection for Recognition
line7.description: Assist candidates in gathering necessary documents for recognition and certification in their respective fields.

line8.title: Visa Application Assistance
line8.description: Guide candidates through the visa application process in their home country, providing comprehensive support and guidance.

line9.title: Information Communication to Recruits
line9.description: Communicate all necessary information, requirements, and expectations clearly to recruits throughout the recruitment and relocation process.

line10.title: Continuous Candidate Support
line10.description: Provide continuous support to candidates from contract signing to relocation, ensuring a smooth transition to their new roles in the target country.
